title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.41 - Existing allocations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.41 - Existing allocations

State Regulations

It is the policy of the commission to charge all water
transferred from the basin against any special regional allocation or any
depletive use allocation as may exist at the time of receipt of a completed
application for transfer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
890.41

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
